name: Sensitive Feature Name(s)
description: This is the sensitive feature name(s) in your dataset (e.g. gender, race). Please use commas to separate.

name: Favourable Resource / Opportunity Allocated
description: This resource/opportunity that is favourable in this use case (e.g., loan, bail)

name: Qualified Group
description: This is the name of the group that should receive the benefit or opportunity, based on fairness – not actual data. (e.g. qualified candidates, defendant who will not bail out when given a bail)

name: Unqualified Group
description: This is the name of the group that should NOT receive the benefit or opportunity, based on fairness – not actual data. (e.g. unqualified candidates, defendant who will bail out when given a bail)
